Reference

All functions

calib_sofun()

Calibrates SOFUN model parameters

collect_drivers_sofun()

Collect all drivers

collect_obs_eval()

Get observational data for model evaluation

eval_sofun()

Evaluates SOFUN model outputs.

filter_days()

Filter daily observations

get_stats()

Get statistics

init_dates_dataframe()

Initialises a data frame with dates

oob_calib_eval_sofun()

Conducts an out-of-bag calibration

prepare_setup_sofun()

Complements the setup settings

run_lm3ppa_f_bysite()

R wrapper for SOFUN

run_pmodel_f_bysite()

R wrapper for SOFUN

runread_lm3ppa_f()

Run LM3-PPA

runread_pmodel_f()

Run the P-model

sbs_calib_eval_sofun()

Conducts an site-by-site calibration

update_params()

Update model parameters
